price: (Allāhu) mọ ohun tó ń bẹ níwájú wọn àti ohun tó ń bẹ lẹ́yìn wọn. Wọn kò sì níí ṣìpẹ̀ (ẹnì kan) àfi ẹni tí (Allāhu) bá yọ́nú sí. Wọ́n tún ń páyà fún ìbẹ̀rù Rẹ̀.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يَشۡفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ وَهُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَتِهِۦ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum walā yashfaʿūna illā limani ir'taḍā wahum min khashyatihi mush'fiqūna
